command:
. "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/html.sh"
cd "${TM_DIRECTORY}"
out=`"${TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT}/perlcheckmate.pl" "${TM_FILEPATH}"`
if [[ $out ]]
  then htmlHeader "Perl syntax errors for ${TM_FILENAME}";
       exit_show_html "$out";
       htmlFooter
  else exit_show_tool_tip "No errors!"
fi
name: Validate Syntax
